content.value:
Music Hostel Cartagena is an execelent hostel with the best location in the historical center of Cartagena de Indias, with an excellent music where live music events in our incredible terrace.

We are located in the historical center of Cartagena de Indias, two blocks from the Clock Tower and one block from the Catalina Indian Monument.

We have shared rooms of 10, 8 and 4 beds and private rooms with air conditioning and bathroom.

Cancellation policy: 48 hours before arrival.

Payment upon arrival by cash, credit cards, debit cards.
This property may pre-authorise your card before arrival.

-Taxes included.
-Breakfast not included.

General:
-24 hours Reception
-No curfew.
-Pet friendly.
-We do not serve breakfast.

description.description: Music Hostel Cartagena is a hostel located in Getseman√≠, Cartagena de Indias, has a terrace where you can enjoy the most varied music. Music Hostel Cartagena is a hostel located in Gethsemane, Cartagena de Indias, with its own bar, kitchen, TV, board games and many more amenities, Private and shared rooms for travelers from every corner of the world.
